attributes.action: promote a nationwide strategy to implement unrestricted Bus Lane Access for Motorcycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that unrestricted Bus Lane and High occupancy vehicle access for motorcycles is offered nationwide.
The Motorcycling Strategy, published in February 2005 in the Traffic Advisory Leaflet TAL02/07 sought to facilitate motorcycling as a choice of travel within a safe and sustainable transport framework. Recognizing that motorcycling has become increasingly popular, it says its benefits include:
• Providing independence and mobility
• Widening employment opportunities, especially where public transport is limited
• Providing a shorter journey time in congested traffic conditions
• Reducing overall congestion and more efficiently using roads and parking spaces
We ask that this is not left to be decided at a local level as indifference or apathy has been demonstrated there, and that this 5 year old recommendation is now prioritised for action as the positive way forward in pursuit of a sustainable solution to the transport network.
